scene_description_enriched: A bearded man, identified as a prophet or patriarch, is depicted seated. He wears a vibrant orange robe and a blue undergarment. His right hand holds a chalice containing a white host, while his left hand rests on a golden orb. Behind him, a richly patterned gold and blue textile serves as a backdrop. The figure is seated on a green, rocky terrain, with pink architectural elements suggesting a stylized mountainous or fortified setting on either side. The overall scene is framed by a decorative border.
